Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Promethean - the name of a Secret tech.

Claiming this world's Phoenix vaults should appease the [abilityblue]Promethean[/abilityblue] elements in your empire and grant us a significant insight into their advanced weapons systems.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Phoenix Vault[/abilityblue] claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
占领这个星球的凤凰宝库应该能够安抚你帝国中的[abilityblue]圣火[/abilityblue]信奉者，并使我们深入了解他们先进的武器系统。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个[abilityblue]凤凰宝库[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Promethean - the name of a Secret tech. Phoenix Vaults - in game Name of the Promethean Landmarks.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

Exploiting this world's natural fertility should appease the [abilityblue]Amazon[/abilityblue] factions in your empire and ensure they are more willing to share their secrets.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Food Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
开发这个星球的自然肥力应该能够安抚帝国中的[abilityblue]亚马逊人[/abilityblue]阵营，并让她们更加乐意分享自己的秘密。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]食物专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Vanguard[/abilityblue] wishes nothing more than the rebuilding of civilization, and founding new colonies on this dead world should please them.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Colony[/abilityblue] you found grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]先锋[/abilityblue]的唯一愿景就是重建他们的文明，在这个没有生气的星球上建立新的殖民地应该能令他们感到欣慰。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]殖民地[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Syndicate[/abilityblue] would certainly be pleased if you secured an alliance with the Paragon.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Reach the relation level [abilityblue]Integration[/abilityblue] with the [abilityblue]Paragon[/abilityblue].[/bullet][/bulletList]
如果你与完人结成同盟，[abilityblue]辛迪加[/abilityblue]一定会很高兴。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]与[abilityblue]完人[/abilityblue]达到[abilityblue]融合[/abilityblue]关系级别。[/bullet][/bulletList]
与[abilityblue]完人[/abilityblue]的关系达到“融合”

[abilityblue]Synthesis[/abilityblue] elements in your empire would be pleased to be given the opportunity to have an inside look at the Autonom network, secure the Autonom's trust and they will be pleased.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Reach the relation level [abilityblue]Integration[/abilityblue] with the [abilityblue]Autonom[/abilityblue].[/bullet][/bulletList]
帝国中的[abilityblue]合成[/abilityblue]信奉者将很乐意有机会深入了解自主机械的网络。获得自主机械的信任，这些信奉者将得到满足。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]与[abilityblue]自主机械[/abilityblue]达到[abilityblue]融合[/abilityblue]关系级别。[/bullet][/bulletList]
与[abilityblue]自主机械[/abilityblue]的关系达到“融合”

The [abilityblue]Promethean[/abilityblue] accept no comprimise when it comes to alien aggression. They would be pleased to see the Growth cut down to size.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Growth[/abilityblue] Dwelling claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]圣火[/abilityblue]对异星入侵毫不妥协，他们将很高兴看到灵植受到制裁。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个[abilityblue]灵植[/abilityblue]居住地，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Psynumbra[/abilityblue] respect those with an aptitude for manipulation, asserting your dominance over the Psi-Fish should impress the disciples of the Abyss.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Psi-Fish[/abilityblue] Dwelling claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]赛努布拉[/abilityblue]十分欣赏那些具有操纵能力之人。如果你能统治灵能水母，应该能给这些深渊的信徒留下深刻的印象。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个[abilityblue]灵能水母[/abilityblue]居住地，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Vanguard[/abilityblue] desire a return of order above all, these Spacers are a threat to that order.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Spacer[/abilityblue] Dwelling claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]先锋[/abilityblue]对恢复秩序的渴望高于一切，而这些太空掠夺者对这一秩序构成了威胁。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个[abilityblue]太空掠夺者[/abilityblue]居住地，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
占领[abilityblue]太空掠夺者居住地[/abilityblue]

The [abilityblue]Dvar[/abilityblue] respect those capable of amassing wealth, and claiming Cosmite nodes should go a long way to impressing the Consortia.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each sector containing a [abilityblue]Cosmite Node[/abilityblue] claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]矮人[/abilityblue]十分欣赏那些能够积累财富之人。占领宇宙合金节点应该能够赢得财团的尊敬。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个包含[abilityblue]宇宙合金节点[/abilityblue]的区域，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
占领包含[abilityblue]宇宙合金节点[/abilityblue]的区域

The [abilityblue]Voidtech[/abilityblue] respect those who command a measure of control over the void.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each sector containing a [abilityblue]Teleporter[/abilityblue] claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]虚空科技[/abilityblue]十分欣赏那些能够掌控虚空之人。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个包含[abilityblue]传送器[/abilityblue]的区域，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
占领包含[abilityblue]传送器[/abilityblue]的区域

The [abilityblue]Assembly[/abilityblue] desire control over the Broadcasting network, to what end only time may tell.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each sector containing a [abilityblue]Broadcast Station[/abilityblue] claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]半机械人[/abilityblue]想要控制广播网络，其目的或许只有时间才能揭晓。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每夺取一个包含[abilityblue]广播站[/abilityblue]的区域，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
占领包含[abilityblue]广播站[/abilityblue]的区域

The [abilityblue]Vanguard[/abilityblue] support those that seek to restore civilization to the ruined Star Union, removing the scars of the cataclysm should send the right message.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Hazard[/abilityred] removed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]先锋[/abilityblue]支持那些协助星际联盟文明复兴之人，抚平大灾变带来的创伤应该能向他们传达我们的意图。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每消除一个[abilityred]灾害[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Synthesis[/abilityblue] factions respect those that understand the value of information, and establishing a monitor network may help secure their support.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Monitoring Station[/abilityblue] placed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]合成[/abilityblue]阵营十分欣赏那些理解信息价值之人。建立监测网络可能有助于获得他们的支持。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建立一所[abilityblue]监控站[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Cull: reduce the population of (a wild animal) by selective slaughter

These wild mutations are a danger to the ecosystem of this world. The [abilityblue]Amazon[/abilityblue] matriarchs may be more forthcoming if you stabilize the situation.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
这些野生的突变体对这个星球的生态系统是一种威胁。如果你能稳定局势，[abilityblue]亚马逊人[/abilityblue]的女族长可能会更愿意帮助你。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Dvar[/abilityblue] Consortia have a keen interest in this mineral rich world. Proving your merit as an industrial powerhouse may help get them on your side.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Production Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]矮人[/abilityblue]财团对这个矿产丰富的星球具有浓厚的兴趣。证明你作为工业巨头的价值，这可能会拉拢他们站在你这边。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建立一个[abilityblue]生产专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Imperial Renown is a kinda currency the player uses in game.

The [abilityblue]Dvar[/abilityblue] Consortia have an outstanding bounty for Quartzite and Psionica, presumably for their aptitude for consuming valuable minerals.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Quartzite or Psionica Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]矮人[/abilityblue]财团对石英岩兽和灵蛭发布了惊人的丰厚悬赏，大概是因为它们拥有吞食宝贵矿物的天赋。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]石英岩兽或灵蛭出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
摧毁[abilityred]石英岩兽或灵蛭出生点[/abilityred]

The [abilityblue]Dvar[/abilityblue] Consortia have informed your diplomats that this world is being feuded over by two rival Consortia. Brokering a peaceful solution may please them greatly.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Forge an [abilityblue]Alliance[/abilityblue] with both Dvar for a massive Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]矮人[/abilityblue]财团告诉你的外交官称，两个相互竞争的财团正在争夺这个星球的控制权。调停争端并制作一份和平的解决方案可能会令他们满意。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]与两个矮人财团均结为[abilityblue]同盟[/abilityblue]来获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

[abilityblue]Voidtech[/abilityblue] has contacted your diplomats, claiming that terrible events are set in motion, and that unless a rival empire is destroyed before the 20th cycle, there will be dire consequences.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][abilityblue]Defeating[/abilityblue] another [abilityred]Empire[/abilityred] before turn {TurnLimit} passes grants you a massive Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]

[abilityblue]虚空科技[/abilityblue]阵营联系了你的外交官，声称某些可怕的事件正在进行，如果不能在第 20 个周期之前摧毁对手帝国，星球将面临难以想象的后果。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在第 {TurnLimit} 回合之前[abilityblue]击败[/abilityblue]另一个[abilityred]帝国[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Voidtech: name of Secret tech faction
在第 {TurnLimit} 回合之前[abilityblue]击败帝国[/abilityblue]

A [abilityblue]Vanguard[/abilityblue] Commander has a bounty out for each of the Assembly warlords comprising the alliance reassembling this world, so eliminating them could prove beneficial.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Assembly alliance[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一些半机械人军阀组成的联盟正在改造这个星球，[abilityblue]先锋[/abilityblue]指挥官对此发布了悬赏，消灭这些联盟可能会带来好处。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]半机械人联盟[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]半机械人联盟[/abilityred]指挥官

A [abilityblue]Celestian[/abilityblue] commune has caught wind of the Promethean Cult of Khansu and their plans for this world. They have requested that you stop the Cult's sacrifice.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Cult of Khansu[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一个[abilityblue]星神[/abilityblue]公社听说了关于圣火坎苏教派的传闻以及他们对这个星球的计划。星神信奉者希望你能阻止教派的牺牲。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]坎苏教派[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]圣火[/abilityred]坎苏教派指挥官

The [abilityblue]Voidtech[/abilityblue] respect creative minds. This world has an unusual atmosphere making atmospheric flight difficult, so circumventing this drawback should please the Voidtech.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Orbital Relay Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]

[abilityblue]虚空科技[/abilityblue]阵营十分欣赏那些有创造力的头脑。这个星球不同寻常的大气层使得大气飞行十分困难，解决这一问题应该会让虚空科技阵营感到满意。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建立一个[abilityblue]轨道中继站专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Voidtech: name of Secret tech faction
建立[abilityblue]轨道中继站专精点[/abilityblue]

A [abilityblue]Xenoplague[/abilityblue] scientist is offering a reward for any samples that can be recovered of the Mycelian nests on this world.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Mycelian Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]异星疫病[/abilityblue]科学家正在高价收购这个星球上的菌丝体巢穴样本。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]菌丝体出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Xenoplague: name of Secret tech faction

A [abilityblue]Promethean[/abilityblue] warlord has issued a bounty for the destruction of Hopperhound nests, since this planet in particular suffers from their presence. Cleanse the nests to earn Renown.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Hopperhound Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
这个星球正饱受跳蝗的折磨。一位[abilityblue]圣火[/abilityblue]军阀发布悬赏希望能够摧毁跳蝗巢穴。清理巢穴即可赢得声望。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]跳蝗出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Kir'Ko[/abilityblue] Hive claims that the psycho-active crystals of this world interfere with their Psionic gifts, so destroying them would surely earn their Imperial Renown.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Psionica Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一个[abilityblue]奇尔寇[/abilityblue]蜂巢声称这个星球上的灵能活体水晶干扰了他们的灵能天赋，因此摧毁那些水晶体将为你赢得帝国声望。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]灵蛭出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Celestian[/abilityblue] faith has long demonized Xenopenguins like the ones found on this world, and slaying them should get you into the Celestian's good graces.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Penguin Hive[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]星神[/abilityblue]的信徒一直在妖魔化这个星球上发现的异星企鹅，消灭那些企鹅应该会使你获得星神的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]企鹅巢[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Assembly[/abilityblue] respect intelligence above all. Proving that you hold the same values may impress them.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Research Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]半机械人[/abilityblue]视智慧高于一切，证明你拥有相同的价值观可能会赢得他们的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]研究专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Vanguard[/abilityblue] have requested the restoration of this world's power grid. Setting up a power network in preparation of your conquest would surely please them.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Energy Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]先锋[/abilityblue]想要恢复这个星球的电网，搭建电力网络来准备远征肯定会令他们满意。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]能量专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Psynumbra[/abilityblue] demand a demonstration of faith. Reject your mortal tethers and leave this world a barren waste![br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Colony[/abilityblue] [abilityred]Razed[/abilityred] grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]赛努布拉[/abilityblue]要求你展现信仰，抛弃凡世束缚，让这个星球变成一片荒芜之地！[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每[abilityred]夷平[/abilityred]一个[abilityblue]殖民地[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Promethean[/abilityblue] fight the Alpha Strain wherever it may be found; showing your dedication to its destruction would surely please them.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Xenoplague Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]圣火[/abilityblue]阵营四处与初始毒株抗争，展现你对净化疫病的热情肯定会令他们满意。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]异星疫病出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Shakarn[/abilityblue] respect dominance in their domain. Show them your might on the waves.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Water Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]蜥蜴人[/abilityblue]十分重视领土内的统治地位。向他们展示你驾驭海浪的力量。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]水域出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Psynumbran[/abilityblue] creature manifested in your embassy, demanding the destruction of the Celestian Crusade on this world.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Holy Crusade[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一个[abilityblue]赛努布拉[/abilityblue]生物出现在大使馆，并要求你消灭这个星球上的星神远征军。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]神圣远征军[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]星神[/abilityred]神圣远征军指挥官

A [abilityblue]Kir'Ko[/abilityblue] emissary approached your expedition and requested the destruction of the two Syndicate houses allied on this world. The emmisary claimed they played a prominent role in her kind's oppression in the past.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Syndicate Allies[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]

一名[abilityblue]奇尔寇[/abilityblue]密使找到你的探险队，并要求摧毁在这个星球上结盟的两个辛迪加家族。这位密使声称，这些辛迪加人曾经对她的族人实施过残忍的压迫。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]辛迪加同盟[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]辛迪加[/abilityred]同盟指挥官

A [abilityblue]Syndicate[/abilityblue] noble contacted your ambassador, demanding you crush the Kir'Ko hive established on this world. The man referred to them as 'obsolete property'.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Aggressive Kir'Ko Swarm[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]辛迪加[/abilityblue]贵族联系了你的大使，要求你摧毁奇尔寇在这个星球上建立的蜂巢，他将这些地方称为“退化的财产”。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]侵略的奇尔寇族群[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]奇尔寇[/abilityred]侵略族群指挥官

An [abilityblue]Oathbound[/abilityblue] Seer approached your ambassador with a request: destroy the Apostate warbands nesting on this planet. Do so and be rewarded.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Dark Tower[/abilityred] explored grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一名[abilityblue]誓约者[/abilityblue]先知找到你的大使并要求你消灭那些盘踞在这个星球上的变节者战团，满足他的要求便能得到回报。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每探索一座[abilityred]黑暗高塔[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] Lord contacted your embassy, requesting the destruction of RPR forces on this planet.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]RPR Tower[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]领主联络了你的大使馆，并请求摧毁这个星球上的 RPR 部队。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一座[abilityred] RPR 高塔[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Synthesis[/abilityblue] respect technical skill and planning. Prove your capability to secure their favor.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Strategic Operation[/abilityblue] successfully launched grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]合成[/abilityblue]阵营重视工艺技能和编制规划，证明你的能力并赢得他们的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每成功发起一个[abilityblue]战略行动[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Syndicate[/abilityblue] are a culture of subterfuge and cunning. Prove your cunning to secure their favor.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Covert Operation[/abilityblue] successfully launched grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]辛迪加[/abilityblue]是诡计和狡猾的代名词。证明你的狡诈来获取他们的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每成功发起一个[abilityblue]隐秘行动[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Syndicate[/abilityblue] are a culture of subterfuge and cunning, prove your cunning to secure their favor.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Infiltration[/abilityblue] successfully launched grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]辛迪加[/abilityblue]是诡计和狡猾的代名词。证明你的狡诈来获取他们的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每成功发动一次[abilityblue]渗透[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
Meant to be, same description as row 112. Please copy translation from row 112.
成功发动[abilityblue]渗透行动中心[/abilityblue]

The [abilityblue]Kir'Ko[/abilityblue] will respect an empire that explores their options.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each Commander [abilityblue]Contacted[/abilityblue] grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]奇尔寇[/abilityblue]十分重视那些尊重他们选择的帝国。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每[abilityblue]联系[/abilityblue]一名指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] have left behind a vast legacy; uncovering the past may give an insight into their ways.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Survey Site[/abilityblue] completed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]留下了巨大的财富，揭开过去的面纱也许可以了解他们的行事方式。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每完成一个[abilityblue]调查点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Syndicate[/abilityblue] agent approached your embassador and suggested you make up for this planet's flaws by siphoning from the competition...[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Energy Siphon[/abilityblue] successfully launched grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]辛迪加[/abilityblue]特工来到你的大使馆，并建议你从竞争中吸取能量来弥补这个星球的缺陷……[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每成功发动一次[abilityblue]能量虹吸[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Xenoplague[/abilityblue] scientist demanded you claim this world's settlements, since they could prove excellent test subjects...[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Settlement[/abilityblue] conquered grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]异星疫病[/abilityblue]科学家要求你占领这个世界的定居点，因为这些地方可以提供优秀的测试对象……[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每征服一个[abilityblue]定居点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] emmisary claims that 'bustin' makes him feel good'. There are plenty of creatures hiding near this world's pickups - take them out.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Pickup[/abilityblue] picked up grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]密使称“破坏行动会令他感到愉悦”。许多生物正躲藏在这个星球的拾取物旁——消灭它们。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每获得一个[abilityblue]拾取物[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Amazon[/abilityblue] are masters of adaptation. Show them you can overcome this world's challenges and prosper.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Residential Sector Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]亚马逊人[/abilityblue]是适应环境的大师。向她们证明你能克服这个星球的挑战并繁荣发展。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]住宅区域专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Shakarn[/abilityblue] are masters of naval expansion; prove your merit on the waves to earn their favor.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Hydro-Exploitation[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]蜥蜴人[/abilityblue]是海上扩张的大师。在浪涛中证明你的价值来赢得他们的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建立一个[abilityblue]水利开发点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Oathbound[/abilityblue] view the well-being of their citizens as a demonstration of righteousness; prove you are equally inclined.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Happiness Event[/abilityblue] achieved grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]誓约者[/abilityblue]认为公民的福祉是正义的最佳示范。证明你也有同样的倾向。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每达成一个[abilityblue]幸福事件[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Kir'Ko[/abilityblue] have known the shackles of servitude like no other, so freeing this world from the Darkvoid's clutches should leave an impression.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Voidbringer Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]奇尔寇[/abilityblue]比任何人都了解奴役枷锁的滋味，因此将这个星球从黑暗虚空的魔掌中解救出来应该能赢得他们的敬佩。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]虚空使者出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Psynumbran[/abilityblue] creature appeared in your court, demanding the destruction of this world's empires. Granting its demand may bring great rewards...[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][abilityblue]Defeating[/abilityblue] other [abilityred]Empires[/abilityred] before turn {TurnLimit} ends grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]

一个[abilityblue]赛努布拉[/abilityblue]生物出现在庭院，并要求你摧毁这个星球上的帝国。满足它的要求可能会带来巨大的回报……[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在第 {TurnLimit} 回合结束前[abilityblue]击败[/abilityblue]其他[abilityred]帝国[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
在第 {TurnLimit} 回合之前[abilityblue]击败帝国[/abilityblue]

The [abilityblue]Oathbound[/abilityblue] are obsessed with claiming this 'Grail'. Doing so will surely earn their respect.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Claiming the [abilityblue]Grail[/abilityblue] grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]誓约者[/abilityblue]痴迷于收集这种“圣杯”。帮助他们肯定会赢得他们的尊重。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]获取[abilityblue]圣杯[/abilityblue]便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Kir'Ko[/abilityblue] delegate has demanded you show your understanding of the swarm's philosophy. Crush the threat on this world swiftly to earn their favor.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][abilityblue]Defeating[/abilityblue] another [abilityred]Empire[/abilityred] before turn {TurnLimit} ends grants you a massive Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]

一名[abilityblue]奇尔寇[/abilityblue]的代表要求你展示自己对族群理念的理解。迅速粉碎这个星球的威胁来赢得他们的青睐。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]在第 {TurnLimit} 回合结束前[abilityblue]击败[/abilityblue]另一个[abilityred]帝国[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
在第 {TurnLimit} 回合之前[abilityblue]击败帝国[/abilityblue]

A [abilityblue]Xenoplague[/abilityblue] researcher caught wind of your expedition to this world, and they have pledged their support should you prove up to its challenges.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Hazard[/abilityred] removed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]异星疫病[/abilityblue]研究员听说你正在这个星球上四处探险。他承诺，如果你能证明自己有能力应对挑战，他们将给予你支持。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每消除一个[abilityred]灾害[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Xenoplague[/abilityblue] warlord proclaimed the ELOP to be a weak response to the challenges of this galaxy, and they are offering a bounty for anyone that proves their point.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]ELOP[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]异星疫病[/abilityblue]军阀认为星球平等联盟无法应对银河的挑战，并发布悬赏奖励那些能够证明这一观点之人。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]星球平等联盟[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]星球平等联盟[/abilityred]指挥官

The [abilityblue]Shakarn[/abilityblue] have more reason than most to hate the Voidbringers, and demand their destruction wherever they may be found.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Voidbringer Spawner[/abilityred] destroyed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]蜥蜴人[/abilityblue]比其他种族更有理由憎恨虚空使者，他们要求无论在何处发现虚空使者，都要立刻将其消灭。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每摧毁一个[abilityred]虚空使者出生点[/abilityred]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

Certain [abilityblue]Amazon[/abilityblue] elements wish to see certain rebellious elements brought under control.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Therian[/abilityblue] Dwelling claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一些[abilityblue]亚马逊人[/abilityblue]希望能够控制住某些叛逆分子。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个[abilityblue]兽人[/abilityblue]居住地，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] Lord contacted your embassy, requesting you reclaim the defective Forgotten for him.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Forgotten[/abilityblue] Dwelling claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]领主联络了你的大使馆，希望你能帮他回收那些有缺陷的被遗忘者。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一个[abilityblue]被遗忘者[/abilityblue]居住地，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

An [abilityblue]Assembly[/abilityblue] scientist has requested you establish Research infrastructure on this world to study the strange anomalies.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Research Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]半机械人[/abilityblue]科学家希望你能在这个星球上建立研究基础设施来调查奇怪的异常现象。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]研究专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Synthesis[/abilityblue] respect those with extensive information networks, utilize this worlds doctrinal network to impress them.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Doctrine[/abilityblue] enacted grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]合成[/abilityblue]阵营十分重视那些掌控广阔信息网络之人。利用这个星球的教义网络令他们刮目相看。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每颁布一个[abilityblue]教义[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Psynumbran[/abilityblue] creature appeared in court, demanding the capture and desecration of this world's 'Holy Sites'.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Celestian Archive[/abilityblue] claimed grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一个[abilityblue]赛努布拉[/abilityblue]生物出现在庭院，并要求你占领并亵渎这个星球的“圣地”。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每占领一座[abilityblue]星神档案馆[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Shakarn[/abilityblue] Domok Warlord asked for support in settling a dispute, they want you to eliminate a rival's thralls.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityred]Shakarn Thrall[/abilityred] Commander defeated grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一名多摩克氏族的[abilityblue]蜥蜴人[/abilityblue]军阀希望得到支持解决争端，他们想让你消灭竞争对手的奴隶。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每击败一名[abilityred]蜥蜴人奴隶[/abilityred]指挥官，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
击败[abilityred]蜥蜴人奴隶[/abilityred]指挥官

The [abilityblue]Celestians[/abilityblue] teach control and restraint above all else. Show them that you have mastered restraint.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Defensive Pact[/abilityblue] you forge with another Commander grants you a Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]星神[/abilityblue]的信条视控制与约束高于一切。向他们证明你已经掌握了约束之力。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每与另一名指挥官签订[abilityblue]防御协议[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

A [abilityblue]Heritor[/abilityblue] emmissary has offered a solution to this world's challenges: take from the undeserving and the heretical![br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Colony[/abilityblue] [abilityred]Razed[/abilityred] grants you a substantial Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
一位[abilityblue]继承者[/abilityblue]大使为这个星球面临的挑战提出了解决方案：从低等群体和异教徒那里夺取！[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每[abilityred]夷平[/abilityred]一个[abilityblue]殖民地[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]

The [abilityblue]Oathbound[/abilityblue] revere 'defenders of the people'. Show them you take these matters seriously and prepare for all threats![br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Advanced Military Infrastructure[/abilityblue] upgrade produced grants you an Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]誓约者[/abilityblue]尊崇“人民的捍卫者”。让他们知道你想要认真对待这些事情，同时为一切威胁做好准备！[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每进行一次[abilityblue]高级军事基础设施[/abilityblue]升级，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
进行[abilityblue]高级军事基础设施[/abilityblue]升级

The [abilityblue]Assembly[/abilityblue] are nothing if not efficient. Show them you know how to compensate for setbacks like those on this world.[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]Each [abilityblue]Energy Specialization[/abilityblue] built grants you an Imperial Renown and Experience boost.[/bullet][/bulletList]
[abilityblue]半机械人[/abilityblue]要是没有效率便一无是处。向他们展示你知道如何弥补这个星球上的各种缺陷。[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet]每建造一个[abilityblue]能量专精点[/abilityblue]，便可获得大量帝国声望与经验值提升。[/bullet][/bulletList]
